posts.name: waialua3:59
posts.cooked:
When we finally emptied our waterjet for the 1st time to clean it out, it was amazing what we found in the tank.

In general, the rule in our shop is put things back how you found it when you first came in for the day.  Clean it up better than how the day started.  Clean up is a grade given to students as part of safety.

The no. 1 excuse for students having to leave without cleaning up good, is that their parents are here waiting to pick them up.  So I‚Äôve learned over the years, have a parent meeting going over expectation of the build season and shop safety in general.  You can wait in the parking lot until your child is done with cleanup first before leaving for the day.

Sometimes, I have to scold mentors also‚Ä¶.
